Report for clustering as part of manual annotation at fraction level.

#### Load libraries, source code 

```{r load,  message = FALSE}
library(DropletUtils, quietly = TRUE) 
library(scater, quietly = TRUE) 
library(scuttle, quietly = TRUE) 
library(scran, quietly = TRUE) 
library(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE) 
library(dendextend, quietly = TRUE) 
library(pheatmap, quietly = TRUE) 
library(bluster, quietly = TRUE)
library(RColorBrewer, quietly = TRUE)
set.seed(37)
```

```{r}
sce_inp <- readRDS(file = snakemake@input[["sce_input"]])
sce_l <- readRDS(file = snakemake@input[["sce_l"]])
fraction_curr <- sce_inp$Fraction_ID[1]

color_tables <- snakemake@params[["color_tables"]]

```

```{r}
source(file = "../../source/colors.R")
source(file = "../../source/plotting.R")
source(file = "../../source/sce_functions.R")
```

```{r}

sce_inp <- factor_reference_cts(sce_inp)
sce_l <- factor_reference_cts(sce_l)

if(fraction_curr == "hsc"){
  col_cts["unassigned"] <- "honeydew2"
  col_num <- c(col_num, "DOWNSAMPLED" = "grey90")
}else if(fraction_curr == "str"){
  col_cts["unassigned"] <- "mistyrose3"
}

col_cts_baccin <- col_cts[match(levels(sce_l$baccin_celltype_scmapclust), 
                                names(col_cts))]
col_cts_dahlin <- col_cts[match(levels(sce_l$dahlin_celltype_scmapclust), 
                                names(col_cts))]
col_cts_dolgalev <- col_cts[match(levels(sce_l$dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust),
                                  names(col_cts))]

col_batch_exp_day <- col_alp[names(col_alp) %in% sce_l$Batch_exp_day]
col_batch_seq <- col_num[names(col_num) %in% sce_l$Batch_sequencing]
col_ann_age <- col_ann[names(col_ann) %in% sce_l$Age_ID]
col_ann_fraction <- col_ann[names(col_ann) %in% sce_l$Fraction_ID]
col_species <- col_spc[names(col_spc) %in% sce_l$Species_ID]

col_clust_l <- col_num[names(col_num) %in% sce_l$cluster_louvain]

```

Annotations for reference.

```{r}

identity_plots <- function(sce){
  
  plot_1 <- umap_base(sce, color_by = "baccin_celltype_scmapclust")+ 
    ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr))+
    scale_color_manual("baccin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_baccin)
  plot_1l <- umap_legend(sce, color_by = "baccin_celltype_scmapclust")+
    scale_color_manual("baccin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_baccin)
  legend_1 <- get_legend(plot_1l)

  plot_2 <- umap_base(sce, color_by = "dahlin_celltype_scmapclust")+
    ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr))+
    scale_color_manual("dahlin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_dahlin)
  plot_2l <- umap_legend(sce, color_by = "dahlin_celltype_scmapclust")+
    scale_color_manual("dahlin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_dahlin)
  legend_2 <- get_legend(plot_2l)
  
  plot_3 <- umap_base(sce, color_by = "dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust")+ 
    ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr))+
    scale_color_manual("dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust",
                       values = col_cts_dolgalev)
  plot_3l <- umap_legend(sce, color_by = "dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust")+
    scale_color_manual("dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust", 
                       values = col_cts_dolgalev)
  legend_3 <- get_legend(plot_3l)
  
  PLOT_1 <- ggarrange(plot_1, legend_1)
  PLOT_2 <- ggarrange(plot_2, legend_2)
  PLOT_3 <- ggarrange(plot_3, legend_3)

  return(list(PLOT_1, PLOT_2, PLOT_3))
}

identity_plots <- identity_plots(sce_l)

```

## Silhouette and Purity

```{r}

knitr::knit_exit()

# Silhouette
sil.approx <- approxSilhouette(reducedDim(sce_l, "PCA"), 
                               clusters = sce_l$cluster_louvain)
sil.data <- as.data.frame(sil.approx)
sil.data$closest <- factor(ifelse(sil.data$width > 0, 
                                  sce_l$cluster_louvain, 
                                  sil.data$other))
sil.data$cluster <- sce_l$cluster_louvain

ggplot(sil.data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, sce_l$k_louvain[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

ggplot(sil.data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, sce_l$k_louvain[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_l$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

# Purity
pure_sce <- neighborPurity(reducedDim(sce_l, "PCA"), sce_l$cluster_louvain)
pure_data <- as.data.frame(pure_sce)
pure_data$maximum <- factor(pure_data$maximum)
pure_data$cluster <- sce_l$cluster_louvain

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, sce_l$k_louvain[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, sce_l$k_louvain[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_l$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, sce_l$k_louvain[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, sce_l$k_louvain[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_l$Species_ID))+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")
```
